ygData.subject: Into the jungle! (Nightshift)
ygData.msgSnippet: The shuttle that NIGHTSHIFT is riding in moved swiftly towards the jungle, POLAR CLAW sat in the pilot s chair with PROWL sitting next to him, both of them

Subject: Into the jungle! (Nightshift)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=uLdhKpKYGxcLx2IAsARuJ5AfuTW1VsHJBlXWoFfi5XIXzMbSnrbjeg

The shuttle that NIGHTSHIFT is riding in moved swiftly towards the
jungle, POLAR CLAW sat in the pilot's chair with PROWL sitting next to
him, both of them keeping the ship on course. RAMULUS and WOLFGANG
were sitting in the empty seats near NIGHTSHIFT taking turns watching
him and then the outside of the shuttle as it hurtled through the air.
Occasionally they can feel a bit of air turbulance in flight, but
otherwise the trip is largely uneventuful.

However as they drew closer to their destination WOLFGANG wistled,
"Wow! How big is that thing?" He said as he got a look at the
emmensity of the jungle they were moving towards.

PROWL answered. "Sensors indicate that it is quite large. It is the
area that will one day be known as the Amazon Basin. The Basin
encompasses seven million kilometers, though the forest itself
occupies some 5.5 million kilometers."

"SLAG!" POLAR CLAW said from his seat.

PROWL turned to look at him, "What's wrong?"

"Communications are getting spotty." He said as he tapped one of the
instruments as if that would turn the communication gear back on. He
shook his head as it had little affect.

"I am picking up some sort of energy field from the forest." PROWL
said as he looked back at his instruments. "It seems almost
Unicronian."

There was a grunt from WOLFGANG, "Seems like we are in for the hard
stretch." He smiled, "I'm ready."

There was a nod from RAMULUS as he looked out of the window as the
Jungle was slowly getting closer and closer, but he said nothing.

"Alright! Listen up!" POLAR CLAW said, "If you have any last minute
messages that need to be sent back to the Ark send 'em now. I am
sending a update of everything we know. We are about to loose
communications. Get ready."

(TAG)

Preston
